query.statement: SELECT A.* ,A.USER_NM+'('+A.JIKGUP_NM+')'+'/'+A.DEPT_NM+'/'+A.COMP_NM AS USER_INFO FROM TB_COM_USER A WHERE -- A.BLNGT_ORGNZ = :vo.srch_blngt_orgnz A.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND A.USER_ID IN ( SELECT D.USER_ID FROM TB_COM_ROLE_USER D WHERE D.ROLE_CD IN ('RA02') ) ORDER BY USER_SRT
UPDATE TB_COM_USER SET USER_SRT=:vo.user_srt WHERE USER_ID=:vo.user_id
